description: 2-hour individual exam covering all course topics including MATLAB/Python commands, numerical algorithms, and theories. Consists of short numerical and short answer questions.

Group assessment involving programming numerical algorithms, project management, and science communication. Includes project report (10%), source code submission (8%), and 5-minute presentation (2%). Assessed on collaboration and technical implementation.
50-minute individual online test via Mobius platform assessing weeks 1-5 content including floating point arithmetic and numerical problem-solving with MATLAB.

Individual programming assessments via MATLAB Grader: two short assignments (1.5% each in Weeks 4/9) and one long assignment (12% in Week 8). Focuses on MATLAB/Python implementation of numerical methods.
